Proven track record in hospitality, real estate and start-ups/scale-ups.",https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E03AQEtfsPOlBFaRg/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1686154375896?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=xaJupGOTacDDyh57VZodFqOSuyhVQpDvr9Dtk-HyFZ4,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E16AQHK_ejDn8WcFw/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1645704694464?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=8ZMRFOJZtbjR37tyVpDPwttJDP_rujX2vkvEmVoUhEA,personal,ACoAAACHMYoB9PdudA1RPB1AA6hW2yfKvU9tfgE,8860042,,"I am a strong entrepreneurial leader with an all-round service-oriented commercial background. My strength is to initiate, implement and supervise sustainable changes within commercial medium-sized organizations (from customers perspective). I'm building bridges between the different disciplines in the organization and will enthuse people for a common goal. My personal style can be described as a coach but firm manager who focuses on achieving a common set (commercial) target. Good listening and showing empathy are my main properties. I consider human (customer) relationships based on mutual trust and respect as the basis for success in business. An appreciative and positive approach is an important factor for me. I'm a people person who commits. My style is convincing, enthusiastic, motivating and communicative.

Due to Covid-19 my personal future ambitions for this location (expansion with additional hotel- and conference rooms) had to be postponed till further notice. Responsible for the acquisition of Marriott Hotel Stuttgart, the start-up of Hotel Nassau in Breda and the take-over and start-up of Boutique Hotel Glow in Eindhoven through a unique three-party collaboration with the hotel management company, the real estate owner and Marriott International/Intercontinental Hotel Group. In this role actively involved in the acquisition and preparation of feasibility studies for various hotel developments in Germany, Turkey, Belgium and the Netherlands.

In close collaboration with the current CEO, various possible developments from a hospitality and real estate perspective were assessed and calculated.

About Odyssey Hotel Group:
The Odyssey Hotel Group specializes in operating hotels in The Netherlands, Germany and Belgium. Most of the hotels are operated in close cooperation with Marriott International.
The Odyssey team has a broad experience in operations, F&B management, sales&marketing, FF&E design and installation, construction and location search.
Banks, investors and property developers frequently ask us to carry out turn-around management or to investigate the chances of converting existing property into hotels.
Specialties: Sandwich bridge construction, feasibility studies, location search, performance checks, hospitality concepts, fit out and refurbishments.', 'title': 'Directeur operations / managing partner', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1518494, 'name': 'Het Scheepvaartmuseum', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFPACllD9VPew/company-logo_400_400/0/1558955769690?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=nTdbREnEak7QAcV3kfwJ5lmnHyWnDHpga89gb2QfKts', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/het-scheepvaartmuseum/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Het Scheepvaartmuseum', 'description': 'Directly after the reopening of this iconic museum, I was ultimately responsible for starting up and building up the Event Sales department. First point of contact for the external caterers and the business relations who organized their commercial events in this special building. In this role I was also able to work a lot on my holistic view of making a cultural institution successful that has to learn to think commercially, without this detracting from the story and the facilities. 

In this role reporting directly to the commercial director and indirectly to the managing director.', 'title': 'Interim Head of Sales & Operations (PT)', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 102563, 'name': 'Htel Serviced Apartments', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQHLaFXVT5KDtg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519961782118?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=a9hlLhcCnfEYOR3Y2pZvBGBJGb3PX6Ykbw26o0WaOlk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/htel-serviced-apartments/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Htel Serviced Apartments', 'description': 'Htel Serviced Apartments (315 apartments) is the leading provider of temporary accommodation for both business and private market. In addition, the entire migration process for skilled migrants who are guided (semi) permanently to the Netherlands can be taken care of. 
- Project management with the CEO / owner with focus on change management from the client side, growth issues, starting new activities.
- P& L responsible, directly reporting to CEO/owner
- Direct management of the Business Development team, the Head of Operations, Resident Service Managers from 2 locations, the marketing agency and external communication / public relations consultants. 
- Maintenance of (inter)national customer relationships with large corporate organizations, travel agents and ""affiliate partners. 
- Maintaining relationships with the local municipality of Amsterdam, Economic Affairs and the municipality of Amstelveen on short stay policy and expatriate related issues. 
- Restructure and building the internal organization including implementation of an integrated organizational model with mission, vision, core values, behavioral characteristics and complete assessment. 
- Several cost-saving and / or efficiency and optimizing sales negotiated projects, undertaken and successfully completed, including deployment of new IT infrastructure, design and implement new organizational structure,  implement and supervise various tenders, complete set procurement policy, strategic cooperation on marketing related issues such as corporate identity, website optimization, SEO, Online PR, Social Media, online booking system integration, direct connectivity to Global Distribution System and active blog writing.', 'title': 'General Manager', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}}, 'company': 'Htel Serviced Apartments', 'description': 'Htel Serviced Apartments (315 apartments) is the leading provider of temporary accommodation for both business and private market. - Launch of strategic alliances with various affiliate partners, travel agents and multinational relocators.
- Active participation in various trade associations and local business networks.
